inventory=[{"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 4, "index": 10}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 49, "index": 11}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 21, "index": 13}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 26, "index": 39}]

thought: To craft a stone_hoe I need to craft a stick. To craft a stick I need to place 2 bamboo in the crafting table. Therefore I will move one of the bamboo (slot 10) into the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1
